name: Graveyard Nightmare (kblo04, carlinhu, Phael.Zero, Esley, Wellzitu)
name_original: Graveyard Nightmare (kblo04, carlinhu, Phael.Zero, Esley, Wellzitu)
description:
Graveyard Nightmare is an adventure game, control Joshua in search of his cap inside the terrible cemetery. Use your flashlight to reveal relationships and destroy illusions.

For better enjoyment of the game read the tutorial before playing.

Controls:
WASD to move
Hold Shift to run
Press F to drag objects
Left mouse button turn flashlight on and off
